solution_line_template: Mildred and Candice spent ${mildred_spent} + ${candice_spent} = $<<{mildred_spent}+{candice_spent}={total_spent}>>{total_spent} in total.
Therefore, they were left with ${initial_money} - ${total_spent} = $<<{initial_money}-{total_spent}={money_left}>>{money_left} after spending.
